# userCurated

**Instance Property**

A value that indicates the user selected the item.

## Declaration

```swift
var userCurated: NSNumber? { get set }
```

## Discussion

Examples of items to set this property on include media content the user downloads and websites or news articles the user bookmarks.

## Describing user involvement

- **userCreated**: A value that indicates the user created the item.
- **userOwned**: A value that indicates the user purchased or owns the item.

items.description: A value that indicates the user created the item.
items.name: userCreated

items.description: A value that indicates the user purchased or owns the item.
